title: How to Make a Lucky Lady Cocktail

steps.headline: Pour the raspberry vodka into a cocktail mixer.
Add the coconut rum into the mixer.
Add the spiced rum into the mixer.
Add the melon liquor into the mixer.
Add the Midori into the mixer.
Add the amaretto into the mixer.
Add a splash of sour mix into the mixer.
Add the orange, pineapple, and cranberry juice into the mixer.
Fill a glass with ice.
steps.description: Strain the drink into the glass. Pour grenadine down the side of the glass.

steps.headline: Add a cherry and an orange slice for garnish if you wish.

text: Pour the raspberry vodka into a cocktail mixer.  Add the coconut rum into the mixer.  Add the spiced rum into the mixer.  Add the melon liquor into the mixer.  Add the Midori into the mixer.  Add the amaretto into the mixer.  Add a splash of sour mix into the mixer.  Add the orange, pineapple, and cranberry juice into the mixer.  Mix well.  Fill a glass with ice. Strain the drink into the glass. Pour grenadine down the side of the glass. Add a cherry and an orange slice for garnish if you wish.
